trans-unit.source: Maps a XAML element name to the appropriate CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" /> in assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 將 XAML 項目名稱對應至組件中適當的 CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> is part of an advanced WPF scenario that supplies alternate context for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> 屬於進階 WPF 的案例中，提供替代內容<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlWriter>。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] WPF applications, you should consider overriding <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext> for this scenario, rather than attempting to use <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>.
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]WPF 應用程式，您應該考慮覆寫<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>此案例中，而不是嘗試使用<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> can be used to provide the XAML parser with custom mapping information through a more direct technique than the application of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute> values on the assembly code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> 可用來提供更直接的技術的應用程式比透過自訂的對應資訊的 XAML 剖析器<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute>組譯程式碼的值。

trans-unit.source: This might be useful for consolidation of all CLR namespaces in an assembly, or for referencing types that are XAML-ready in an existing assembly without having to recompile it just to add <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute> attributing.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是適用於組件中的所有 CLR 命名空間的彙總或參考型別，是為了增加而不必重新編譯時的現有組件中的 XAML 已備妥<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinitionAttribute>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: You typically create a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> instance in order to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext.XamlTypeMapper%2A> property value for a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext>.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會建立<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>執行個體，以指定<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext.XamlTypeMapper%2A>屬性值<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext> in turn can be used as the context for a <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Markup.ParserContext%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ParserContext>依次可用做為環境<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Load%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Markup.ParserContext%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Default Mapper
trans-unit.target: 預設對應工具

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a default mapper using the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.DefaultMapper%2A> static property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用預設對應程式來取得<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.DefaultMapper%2A>靜態屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default mapper only works on a default assembly list.
trans-unit.target: 預設對應工具只適用於預設組件清單。

trans-unit.source: No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> constructors) is used.
trans-unit.target: 沒有組件的特定資訊 (如中所指定<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>建構函式) 會使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The array of assembly names the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> should use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 應該使用的組件名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> class by specifying an array of assembly names that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> should use.
trans-unit.target: 藉由指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 應該使用的組件名稱陣列，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyNames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyNames" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The array of assembly names the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> should use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 應該使用的組件名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: The array of namespace maps the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> should use.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 應該使用的命名空間對應陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> class, using the specified array of assembly names and the specified namespace maps.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的組件名稱陣列和指定的命名空間對應，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyNames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyNames" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The prefix for the XML namespace..
trans-unit.target: XML 命名空間的前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The CLR namespace that contains the types to map.
trans-unit.target: 包含要對應之型別的 CLR 命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that contains the CLR namespace.
trans-unit.target: 包含 CLR 命名空間的組件。

trans-unit.source: Defines a mapping between an XML namespace and CLR namespaces in assemblies, and adds these to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> information.
trans-unit.target: 定義 XML 命名空間和組件中 CLR 命名空間之間的對應，並且將這些對應加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 資訊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AddMappingProcessingInstruction%2A> is a programmatic way to add a mapping.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AddMappingProcessingInstruction%2A> 是程式設計方式來新增對應。

trans-unit.source: For example, the different parts of the following XAML mapping instruction correspond to the parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AddMappingProcessingInstruction%2A>:
trans-unit.target: 下列 XAML 對應指令的不同部分，例如對應至參數的<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AddMappingProcessingInstruction%2A>:

trans-unit.source: The `xmlNamespace` is `SDK`, the `clrNamespace` is `Samples`, and the `assemblyName` is `SDKSamples`.
trans-unit.target: `xmlNamespace`是`SDK`、`clrNamespace`是`Samples`，而`assemblyName`是`SDKSamples`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="xmlNamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="xmlNamespace" /> 是 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="clrNamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="clrNamespace" /> 是 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="assemblyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The type to access.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的型別。

trans-unit.source: Requests permission for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> derived type that is called under full trust to access a specific internal type.
trans-unit.target: 要求 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 衍生型別的使用權限，以便在完全信任的情況下呼叫此型別來存取特定內部型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以存取內部型別則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If not overridden by a subclass, <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AllowInternalType%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未由子類別，覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AllowInternalType%2A>一律會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When overridden by a subclass, the behavior should be that <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AllowInternalType%2A> should return `true` if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫時由子類別，行為應該是<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper.AllowInternalType%2A>應該傳回`true`內部型別可存取; 否則如果`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> to use if one has not been specified.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper" /> 的執行個體，如果尚未指定執行個體，則使用該執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default type mapper.
trans-unit.target: 預設型別對應器。

trans-unit.source: The default mapper only works on a default assembly list.
trans-unit.target: 預設對應工具只適用於預設組件清單。

trans-unit.source: No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper> constructors) is used.
trans-unit.target: 沒有組件的特定資訊 (如中所指定<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper>建構函式) 會使用。

trans-unit.source: In the current implementation the default assembly list is: `WindowsBase`, `PresentationCore`, `PresentationFramework`.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的實作是預設組件清單： `WindowsBase`， `PresentationCore`， `PresentationFramework`。

trans-unit.source: Using the default mapper does not mean that you cannot use custom assemblies/types in XAML at all.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設對應工具並不表示您無法使用自訂的組件類型在 XAML 中完全。

trans-unit.source: It only means that if you do use custom types/assemblies, you must then use the conventional XAML technique of creating the mappings as `xmlns` attributes in each XAML page where the types/assemblies are referenced, as opposed to a type mapper API.
trans-unit.target: 它僅表示如果您使用自訂類型/組件，您必須再使用傳統的 XAML 技巧，建立做為對應的`xmlns`每個類型/組件所參考位置，而不是型別對應器應用程式開發介面的 XAML 頁面中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。

trans-unit.source: The specified XML namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 XML 命名空間前置詞。

trans-unit.source: The "local" name of the XAML element to obtain the mapped <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for.
trans-unit.target: 用來取得所對應 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 之 XAML 項目的「本機」名稱。

trans-unit.source: Local in this context means as mapped versus the provided <c>xmlNamespace</c>.
trans-unit.target: 這裡所指的本機意謂對應時相對於已提供的 <c>xmlNamespace</c>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that a given XAML element is mapped to, using the specified XML namespace prefix and element name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 命名空間前置詞和項目名稱，取得指定的 XAML 項目所對應的 CLR <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the object, or <see langword="null" /> if no mapping could be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，如果無法解析對應則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If a type cannot be found that maps to the provided information, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別無法對應至提供的資訊，找到`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: Do not include the prefix as part of `localName`.
trans-unit.target: 一部分，不包含前置詞`localName`。

trans-unit.source: For any prefixed XAML element information, separate it into `xmlNamespace` and `localName` components for this API call.
trans-unit.target: 針對任何前置 XAML 項目資訊時，區隔到`xmlNamespace`和`localName`此應用程式開發介面呼叫的元件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="xmlNamespace" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="xmlNamespace" /> 是 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="localName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="localName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The short name of the assembly without an extension or path specified (equivalent to <see cref="P:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name" />).
trans-unit.target: 組件的簡短名稱，即不指定副檔名或路徑 (等同於 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name" />)。

trans-unit.source: The file path of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The assembly path must be a full file path containing a file extension.
trans-unit.target: 組件路徑必須是包含副檔名的完整檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to use when loading an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定路徑，載入組件時使用此路徑。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 是 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="assemblyPath" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyPath" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="assemblyPath" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyPath" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="assemblyPath" /> is not a full file path containing a file extension.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyPath" /> 不是包含檔案副檔名的完整檔案路徑。
